title: Secret Lady - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Josei   Mystery   Psychological   Romance   Tragedy
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Confident Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Ghosts   Hidden Abilities   Nobles   Past Trauma   Pragmatic Protagonist   Reincarnated in Another World   Sibling's Care   Stoic Characters   Sword And Magic
author: Angato   안가토
description:
A child who has the ability to see ghosts, Yoon Seol-woo.

Has reincarnated into Rosantine, a princess who could see ghosts.

I’ve managed to fake not being able to see ghosts somehow but…

“Leave my sibling’s body this instant!”

I cried out to the spirit who’s possessed my one and only little sister.

However, only the death penalty awaited for me if my ability were to be found out.

Then, there’s only one way.

“You’re planning to kill Prince Chartus, right?”

I will save the Empire’s second prince, Prince Chartus with this ability!

“I’ll bet my life on Your Highness.”>
